question: The High-Level Segment of the United Nations Economic and Social Council (ECOSOC) session was virtually held in which city?
explanation:
The High-Level Segment of the United Nations Economic and Social Council (ECOSOC) session of this year was recently organised at the United Nations in New York.
Prime Minister of India Narendra Modi has recently addressed a key note address in the session. This is his first address after India has been selected as a non-permanent member of the United States Security Council.
